word_group.brief_definition: 天然的美感；自然美；自然美景
选美大赛；选美大会；机构评比
第一美女；冠军小姐；选美皇后
风景点, 游览胜地；美人斑, 美人痣, 人工美人斑

word_group.phrase: beauty is in the eye of the beholder

word_group.brief_definition: 美人斑，美人痣；人工美人斑
美容院；美容沙龙；美容美发厅
美容产品；美容品；美容用品
伟大的美；很美；非常美；特别美
选美比赛；选美大赛；选美活动

bilingual.source: I was totally unprepared for its unique beauty.
bilingual.target: 我完全没有准备好迎接它独特的美。

bilingual.source: Some walk up to this place because of its beauty.
bilingual.target: 有些人因为它的美丽而走到这里。

bilingual.source: Its sad beauty not only paints a picture of Abing's own life but also makes people recall their deepest wounds.
bilingual.target: 它的悲美不仅描绘了阿炳自己的生活，还让人们回忆起自己最深的伤痛。

bilingual.source: The beauty of the world lies in the diversity of its people.
bilingual.target: 世界的美丽在于人们的多样性。

bilingual.source: The large building would also ruin the beauty of the landscape.
bilingual.target: 大建筑也会破坏景观的美丽。

bilingual.source: Words are not enough to describe the beauty and uniqueness of the experience!
bilingual.target: 语言不足以描述这种经历的美丽和独特！

bilingual.source: Watching them move slowly across the green grass, I'm struck by their beauty.
bilingual.target: 看着它们缓慢地穿过绿草，我被它们的美丽所震撼。

bilingual.source: The most common things, from paper to clay to bamboo, are turned into objects of beauty.
bilingual.target: 从纸到粘土到竹子，最常见的东西都变成了美丽的物品。

bilingual.source: When the prince took the delicate, tiny slipper in his hands, the beauty of it filled his heart.
bilingual.target: 当王子拿起那只精致的小拖鞋时，它的美丽充满了他的心。

list.abstract: beauty（英[ˈbjuːti]，美[ˈbjuːti]），英语单词，名词，意思为美；美丽；赏心悦目。短语搭配有beauty sleep（美容睡眠时间），例句为“Undergoing plastic surgeries in pursuit of beauty.（为了追求美丽而接受整形手术。）” beauty名词类近义词有fair、pulchritude，相关反义词有ugliness，动词形式为beautify。
Beauty witch（BEAST的官方歌迷名称）是英文单词里面：美女，美丽的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: The Empty Vase. Translucent beauty... To yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 空花瓶，半透明的美... 不要念出声。

yingyinNormal.en: And what does that leave me? Her beauty. Liar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我遗传的是什么？她的美貌。骗子。

yingyinNormal.en: You're beauty, I'm the beast. You're Beyonce? I'm that guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当美女，我当野兽，你当碧昂斯，我就是...那谁。

yingyinNormal.en: Grace and beauty. Peppa loves dancing. Everyone loves dancing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 动作要做得优雅美丽。佩琪喜欢跳舞，大家都喜欢跳舞。

yingyinNormal.en: Confident, ball-busting beauty who's always rolling her eyes at Logan?
yingyinNormal.zh: 自信，喜欢踹男性裆部的美女还总是对罗根翻白眼？

yingyinNormal.en: It is lovely. A mere reflection of the beauty who wears it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很漂亮，漂亮的人穿起它会更美。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm here to argue today that beauty actually is skin deep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我今天的论点是美的确仅存于外表。

yingyinNormal.en: But she warned him not to be deceived by appearances. For beauty is found within.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但老婆婆警告王子不要以貌取人，真正的美在于内心。

yingyinNormal.en: If they're not always the same thing, what's the point in beauty? Look at the violin. I need to know how you escaped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果不常常是一回事，那美还有什么意义？看这把小提琴。我需要知道你怎么逃出来的。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Well, I like the idea of art, the beauty. But only in the right context. Just not as a career. I don't have the necessary talents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，呃，我欣赏艺术的理念，还有它的美，但只是在特定的条件下，但我不想把它当成职业，我自知没有那方面的天分。

yingyinNormal.en: Even though it is easy to be fooled by the beauty of a trojan horse, its real power comes from the army within intelligence, compassion, integrity, courage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使我们很容易被特洛伊木马的美所迷惑，但它真正的力量是来源于其内在的军队，才智，同情，正直，勇气。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you come to do some work? No, it's our day off. So we came to enjoy the Beauty Spot. You can see for miles, boss. Yes, it's very pretty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们都是来工作的吗？不是，今天我们休息。所以我们就想来大山风景区转转。这里视野真好啊，主管。没错，这风景真美。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you come to do some work? No, it's our day off. So we came to enjoy the Beauty Spot. You can see for miles, boss. Yes, it's very pretty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们都是来工作的吗？不是，今天我们休息。所以我们就想来大山风景区转转。这里视野真好啊，主管。没错，这风景真美。

yingyinNormal.en: The Mountain Beauty Spot is now a big hole. It's a cave now. Welcome to the Cave Beauty Spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美丽的大山风景区现在变成了一个大大的坑。现在它变成了一个洞穴了，欢迎大家到洞穴风景区游玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Petit jete. Grace and beauty. Petit jete. Grace and beauty. The ballet lesson is a lot of fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 交织式跳跃，动作要优雅美丽，交织式跳跃，动作要优雅美丽。芭蕾课真是太有意思了。

yingyinNormal.en: So even though beauty may be skin deep, beauty is nowhere near as important as the army inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以即使美丽就是肤浅的，但美丽却远没有内在的自己那么重要。

yingyinNormal.en: The Mountain Beauty Spot is now a big hole. It's a cave now. Welcome to the Cave Beauty Spot. Woo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美丽的大山风景区现在变成了一个大大的坑。现在它变成了一个洞穴了，欢迎大家到洞穴风景区游玩。哦！

yingyinNormal.en: And your wife, I imagine she's a beauty. Aye, she was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜你妻子肯定是个大美人。对，曾经是。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and you've never met one of them. That's the beauty of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，可他们你一个也没见过。这正是其美妙之处。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, maybe you could get in on a beauty scholarship. What a line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唔，没准儿你能拿到选美奖学金呢。哦，别骗人了(嘀咕：我的老天！)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 美丽地；漂亮地；出色地
adj. 美的；美丽的；令人愉悦的；完美的；出色的

word_family.mean: n. 美；美丽；赏心悦目；好看的东西；漂亮的人；美感；美女；化妆品

sense_info_list.en: the qualities of a person or a thing that give pleasure to the senses or to the mind

examination_example.sentence: Even better would be to help elevate notions of <highlight>beauty</highlight> beyond the material standards of a particular industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更好的办法是帮助提升美的概念，使其超越特定行业的物质标准。

examination_example.sentence: They suggest <highlight>beauty</highlight> should not be defined by looks that end up impinging on health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们建议，美貌不应该以最终影响健康的外表来定义。

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy the <highlight>beauty</highlight> of the world around and keep the eyes open to see the possibilities before you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 享受周围世界的美丽，睁大眼睛，看看你面前的各种可能性。

sense_info_list.en: a beautiful or excellent person or thing

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 美丽地；漂亮地；出色地
adj. 美的；美丽的；令人愉悦的；完美的；出色的

word_family.mean: n. 美；美丽；赏心悦目；好看的东西；漂亮的人；美感；美女；化妆品

sense_info_list.en: the qualities of a person or a thing that give pleasure to the senses or to the mind

examination_example.sentence: It's also pushing ahead in 2016 within expansion of Bluemercury, the <highlight>beauty</highlight> chain it bought last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2016年，它还通过扩大去年购买的美容连锁店 Bluemercury 取得了进展。

examination_example.sentence: Designer sportswear would have to be verified by a standard other than that of pure <highlight>beauty</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设计师设计的运动装必须用纯粹美的标准以外的标准来验证。

examination_example.sentence: Fashion is often regarded as a pursuit of <highlight>beauty</highlight>, and some cherished fashion's trivial relationship to the fine arts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时尚常被认为是对美的追求，并且有些人十分重视时尚与艺术之间微妙的关系。

examination_example.sentence: If Paris was cast aside, the tradition of <highlight>beauty</highlight> was also to some degree slighted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果把巴黎抛在一边，美的传统也会在某种程度上被淡化。

examination_example.sentence: The waste has been put down to burning old cosmetic stock to make way for their new <highlight>beauty</highlight> range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了给他们的新化妆品系列让路，这些垃圾被用来焚烧旧化妆品库存。

sense_info_list.en: a beautiful or excellent person or thing

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 美的；美丽的；令人愉悦的；完美的；出色的

word_family.mean: n. 美；美丽；赏心悦目；好看的东西；漂亮的人；美感；美女；化妆品

sense_info_list.en: the qualities of a person or a thing that give pleasure to the senses or to the mind

examination_example.sentence: He wanted to "set the standard for <highlight>beauty</highlight> in classical and modern cooking."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他希望“为古典和现代烹饪的美建立标准”。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, she addresses self-respect and the notion that a person's sense of <highlight>beauty</highlight> must include more than how much a person weighs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，她谈到了自尊和一个人的美感不仅仅包括一个人的体重。

examination_example.sentence: She describes how the definition of <highlight>beauty</highlight> has changed over the years and even from culture to culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她描述了美的定义是如何随着时间的推移而改变的，甚至是从一种文化到另一种文化的转变。

sense_info_list.en: a beautiful or excellent person or thing

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 美丽地；漂亮地；出色地
adj. 美的；美丽的；令人愉悦的；完美的；出色的

word_family.mean: n. 美；美丽；赏心悦目；好看的东西；漂亮的人；美感；美女；化妆品

sense_info_list.en: the qualities of a person or a thing that give pleasure to the senses or to the mind

examination_example.sentence: Fascinated by the structural <highlight>beauty</highlight> of the Forbidden City as a painter, she is equally interested to learn more about Chinese philosophy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名画家，她被紫禁城的结构之美所吸引，同样有兴趣了解更多关于中国哲学的知识。

examination_example.sentence: The crowds might damage the <highlight>beauty</highlight> of the place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人群可能会破坏这个地方的美丽。

examination_example.sentence: I'm always inspired by things of <highlight>beauty</highlight> and harmony.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我总是因美丽和谐的事物而生出灵感。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 美丽地；漂亮地；出色地
adj. 美的；美丽的；令人愉悦的；完美的；出色的

word_family.mean: n. 美；美丽；赏心悦目；好看的东西；漂亮的人；美感；美女；化妆品

examination_example.sentence: After that, we both(两个都) went back to reading and enjoying the <highlight>beauty</highlight> outside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 之后，我们俩又回去看书，欣赏外面的美景。

examination_example.sentence: All in all, life is always full of <highlight>beauty</highlight> as long as you watch carefully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，只要你仔细观察，生活总是充满美好的。

examination_example.sentence: Anyway, one’s <highlight>beauty</highlight> is more valuable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反正一个人的美更有价值。

examination_example.sentence: —Sure, You are expected to read Black <highlight>Beauty</highlight> from pages 58 to 85.
examination_example.sentence_trans: —当然，你应该从第58页到第85页阅读《黑美人》。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Beauty</highlight> sleep is a real thing, researches have shown that people who have enough sleep look more attractive (有魅力的) to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美容觉是真实存在的，研究表明睡眠充足的人看起来更有魅力给别人。

examination_example.sentence: In the early Disney cartoon movies, princesses like Snow White, Cinderella and Aurora from Sleeping <highlight>Beauty</highlight> are usually good-looking and kind-hearted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在早期的迪士尼卡通电影中，像《睡美人》中的白雪公主、灰姑娘和奥罗拉这样的公主通常都很好看，心地善良。
